review: This game is ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ing awesome...I mean tottaly ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ing awesome.It is very educational and its funny jokes are hilarious!In the game you play the role of Agent G and Detective Washington who kill zombies(I am so sorry...i mean mutants).The voice acting is pretty good,tho,the graphics are not the best(but that doesn't metter anyway)...I like the game because of his voice acting,story and its educational purposes       I will give this game a 9,5/10.In conclusion it is a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ing ♥♥♥♥er ♥♥♥♥er ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ awesome game

helpful: 4 of 9 people (44%) found this review helpful
review: Don't know why people hate this game..only because it's an ''Indie''9/10 From Doge

The best game in the ''Elder Scrolls'' series!I really recommend it!The modding community is huge,with different types of mods,from graphics to armor and weapons mods.I like the game because the guards are keep saying:''I used to be an adventure like you,but I took an arrow to the knee''.The graphics are good...not the best but if you'll add an ENB....be sure you have a monster ''rig''.The storyline...Well the storyline in my opinion is the best in the entire ''Elder Scrolls'' series.I give a 10/10.Good work ''Bethesda''!And for the mod creators keep doin' those mods..because this game is awesome...but it gets boring at a time....                          So as I said 10/10!Great job!
One of the best game of 2012 -2013-2014 :X
